statements.update: UPDATE KONTRAK SET KDP3 = #Kdp3#,TGLKON = #Tglawalkontrak#,TGLAWALKONTRAK = #Tglawalkontrak#,TGLAKHIRKONTRAK = #Tglakhirkontrak#, TGLSLSKONK = #Tglakhirkontrak#,URAIAN = #Uraian#,NILAI = #Nilai# WHERE UNITKEY = #Unitkey# AND NOKONTRAK = #Nokontrak# AND KDKEGUNIT = #Kdkegunit# AND THANG = #Thang#
update KONTRAK set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update KONTRAK set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select K.ID, K.UNITKEY, K.NOKONTRAK, K.KDP3,D.NMP3, D.NMINST, K.KDKEGUNIT, K.TGLKON, K.TGLAWALKONTRAK, K.TGLAKHIRKONTRAK, K.TGLSLSKONK, K.URAIAN, K.NILAI, K.THANG from KONTRAK K INNER JOIN DAFTPHK3 D ON D.KDP3 = K.KDP3

where 1=1 and K.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and K.KDKEGUNIT=#Kdkegunit#
and K.THANG=(SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
order by K.NOKONTRAK

where 1=1 and K.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and K.KDKEGUNIT=#Kdkegunit#
and K.THANG=(SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
order by K.NOKONTRAK

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) JMLDATA FROM KONTRAK AS k INNER JOIN ASET_BERITA AS ab ON ab.UNITKEY = k.UNITKEY AND ab.NOKONTRAK = k.NOKONTRAK WHERE k.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and k.KDKEGUNIT = #Kdkegunit# and k.NOKONTRAK = #Nokontrak#
and K.THANG=(SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(d.NILAI),0) NILPAGU FROM DASKR AS d INNER JOIN SKDASK AS s ON s.UNITKEY = d.UNITKEY AND s.IDXDASK = d.IDXDASK AND s.THANG = d.THANG INNER JOIN MATANGR AS m ON m.MTGKEY = d.MTGKEY AND m.THANG = d.THANG WHERE d.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and d.KDKEGUNIT = #Kdkegunit# and s.KDTAHAP = #Kdtahap# and s.THANG = (SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(k.NILAI),0) NILKONTRAK FROM KONTRAK AS k WHERE k.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and k.KDKEGUNIT = #Kdkegunit#
and K.THANG=(SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang') and YEAR(k.TGLKON) = (SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(k.NILAI),0) NILPERKONTRAK FROM KONTRAK AS k WHERE k.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and k.KDKEGUNIT = #Kdkegunit# and k.NOKONTRAK = #Nokontrak#
and K.THANG=(SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang') and YEAR(k.TGLKON) = (SELECT RTRIM(p.CONFIGVAL) FROM PEMDA AS p WHERE p.CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
